title: Cost 23000ip to get a specific champion rune page
body:
Really rito? These prices are garbage. Lets say you already have your standard ap and ad pages. that means:
My udyr rune page:
Rune page:6300
Movement speed quints x3: 6150
Attack speed mark x9: 3690
Armour seals x9: 1845
CDR Glyph x6: 4920
Scaling MR glyph x3:615

Total Cost: 23,520 IP
This is equivalent to almost 4 6300 tier champions, which take about a month to get each. So it takes 1/3 of a year to get a specific rune page.

Solution: All runes in their specific section (glyph,mark,etc) costs the same.
Example: Quint AD:1025  MS Quint: ~~2050~~ -> 1025

replies.body:
Except most people have the ms quints, armor seals and scaling mr glyphs anyways. That halves the cost.
Just wait a year for their rune page sales too.
This is meant for new and casual players who aren't rich of ip

Then work your way up like the rest of the people you're facing.

You said "lets say you got your standard ap ad pages" so you would have the runes i stated above, which means you only really need half that cost. CDR and AS runes are relatively rare, and only a handful of people need them.

Some one hasn't played Yasuo who needs some crit in his runes, which aren't used on any other champion really. Maybe Critplank, but Critplank and Tryndafag usually end up with Crit damage rather than crit chance and Crit damage is pretty high up there in cost despite not being all tooooo good. Pretty funny to use on Tryndamere and Gangplank, but not really viable in most situations, sadly.

It takes you a month to hit 6300 IP? I probably make around 1-2K IP daily, and I think that goes for most players.

Either way, RIOT just had a Rune Page/Rune sale, how can you complain about this now?
